## Mat3.getTransformedXLength() method

Apply this transform as if it were x in a vec3 to both min and max, return the difference.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getTransformedXLength(_min: number, _max: number): number;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  \_min | number |  |
|  \_max | number |  |
